findings.rationale: The indemnification is capped at $150,000, which may not cover the full extent of damages in case of a serious breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify the other for claims arising from its own breach, capped at $150,000 per claim.

findings.rationale: Confidentiality obligations lasting only 2 years post-termination may expose sensitive information to risks after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations continue for 2 years after termination of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: A 30-day notice period might not provide sufficient time for either party to prepare for termination and find replacements.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice.

findings.rationale: The choice of North Carolina law may pose risks if one party is not familiar with this jurisdiction's legal nuances.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement is subject to North Carolina state law.
